description: This Dart source file defines an API client class for interacting with a backend REST API. It includes methods for user authentication, user signup, fetching court data, creating bookings, retrieving user bookings, and fetching admin summaries. The class supports mock mode for testing purposes when the API base URL is not configured.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A lightweight REST API client for communication with a FastAPI backend, handling authentication, data retrieval, and booking operations.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts to log in a user with email and password. Returns a tuple containing the token and user data.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Creates a new user account with provided name, email, and password. Returns the created user.

methods.name: getCourts
methods.description: Retrieves a list of courts along with their available slots.

methods.name: createBooking
methods.description: Creates a new booking for a specified court, start and end times, and group size.

methods.name: myBookings
methods.description: Fetches the bookings associated with the current user.

methods.name: adminSummary
methods.description: Fetches a summary of the admin dashboard, including total courts, bookings today, and active users.
